ygData.subject: Re: Leveling
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm... Old world hunting eh? Good stuff... sometimes. Try Crushbone, Blackburrow, or even the Warrens for a while. For the mid-teens head to Oasis
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm... Old world hunting eh? Good stuff...
sometimes.<br><br>Try Crushbone, Blackburrow, or even the Warrens for a
while. For the mid-teens head to Oasis (although
lavastorm is good if you have a magic weapon, especially
for mages and druids anti-summon spells). Around 20,
southern Karana or Lake Rathe, or Everfrost (mammoths are
great cash). Around 30, you can start looking for
groups in Rathe Mtns, Soldunga, or even the Stonebrunt
Mtns. Around 40, just about anywhere is fair game,
though Nagafen's Lair is good, or Lower Guk has some
nice stuff in it. <br><br>Don't forget Mistmoore
somewhere between 28/29 and 40 or so, pick up some
Mistmoore granite for Armor of Ro quests for your
paladin.<br><br>Adventure around, there's always stuff to kill.<br>I left
out the whole area around Highpass/Kithicor/the
gorge/runnyeye... all of it good stuff...<br><br>Good
luck!<br><br>Nukai Oakenwulf<br>Tunare's Chosen of Karana<br>Chief
Druid Executive of Spiritus Valorum
